ORIGAM Documentation : Database Field

Created by Rita Vavrdová, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Jan 14, 2019

This model element maps an entity field to a physical, such as a database or a column. 

Attributes

MappedColumnNameName of the physical field, e.g. database field. When creating a new field the database column name is the same as the name of the entity field. You can change this name e.g. if you map to an existing entity and you do not want to keep the database names in your entity model.
